scripts.postinstall: node prisma/load-env.js && node -e "try { require('@prisma/client'); } catch (e) { console.log('Prisma Client not found, installing...'); process.exit(1); }" || npx prisma generate
scripts.build: node prisma/setup-github-env.js && node -e "try { require('@prisma/client'); } catch (e) { console.log('Installing Prisma Client...'); process.exit(1); }" || npx prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: node prisma/load-env.js && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.azure:migrate: node prisma/load-env.js && node -e "try { require('@prisma/client'); console.log('Using existing Prisma client'); } catch (e) { console.log('Database is already set up'); }"
